definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: The 47 defendants appeared behind closed doors in a special security court in Manama.
sentences.chinese: 47名被告在麥納麥特別安全法庭閉門受審。

sentences.english: Above, an injured protester at a Manama hospital.
sentences.chinese: 上圖爲麥納麥醫院的一名受傷示威者。
